= Introduction =

This document describes the data format for biological signals
Terminology:
EEG= 
ECG=

 
= Data labeling =
Every recording session should contain:
  # Subject name
  # Type of recording
  # Type of task
  # Type of device used
  # Timestamp and session duration
  # Accesss token
  # Privacy agreement  

= Details =
The data format for the brain waves follows:
{{{

struct BrainPacket
{
byte signal_strength,
byte attention,
byte meditation,
int delta,
int theta,
int low alpha, 
int high alpha,
int low beta, 
int high beta, 
int low gamma, 
int high gamma

}
}}}
